articles.title: CISA’s security-by-design initiative is at risk: Here’s a path forward | TechCrunch
articles.description: Success with security-by-design is at risk, both from the political challenges of implementation and the threat of unrealistic expectations.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Twitter, now X, opens up its ad revenue sharing program with global creators
articles.description: Earlier this month, Twitter — which has since rebranded as X — began sharing ad revenue with verified creators in an attempt to retain top talent on its platform. Today, the company announced its “Ads Revenue Sharing” program is now available for eligible cre…
